author: Zapper101

text: In the end, the balance between the whacky side and the more serious side comes from Pokey. Even at an old age, he's still a little kid inside and for him, everything he's doing is like a game. While he's having fun killing people and destroying the world as if they were toys, we see first-hand the direct and horrible consequences of his antics. I guess it really depends on the person, but to me this constant balance and conflict between both sides were brilliant.

text: I really liked Porky's Tower with the different ridiculous floors (Hipp Floor, Bathroom Floor, Harem Floor etc.). A tower that ultimately leads you to much more serious end of a story. It's this balance between ridiculous/fun and serious/sad moments that make this series so good to me.
author: SupraDarky
